title: Ants: Fruits
description: Ants: Fruits is a clicker game where you need to help a colony of ants to collect fruits. Click on the fruits to collect them faster and not wait for the ant to get to them. You can also use abilities, for example, there is the ability of a bee that flies out of an anthill and takes the fruit. The game has a variety of achievements that you can unlock as the game progress.
